verses.verse: דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> of Amos אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> was among בַנֹּקְדִ֖ים <WH5349> who was among the herdmen מִתְּק֑וֹעַ <WH8620> of Tekoa אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which חָזָ֨ה <WH2372> which he saw עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> concerning Israel בִּימֵ֣י ׀ <WH3117> in the days עֻזִּיָּ֣ה <WH5818> of Uzziah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבִימֵ֞י <WH3117> and in the days יָרָבְעָ֤ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יוֹאָשׁ֙ <WH3101> of Joash מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <WH8141> two years לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הָרָֽעַשׁ׃ <WH7494> the earthquake

וַיֹּאמַ֓ר ׀ <WH559> And he said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD מִצִּיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> from Zion יִשְׁאָ֔ג <WH7580> will roar וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> from Jerusalem יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and utter קוֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> his voice וְאָֽבְלוּ֙ <WH56> shall mourn נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> and the habitations הָרֹעִ֔ים <WH7462> of the shepherds וְיָבֵ֖שׁ <WH3001> shall wither רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> and the top הַכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <WH3760> of Carmel פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions דַמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because דּוּשָׁ֛ם <WH1758> [the punishment] thereof because they have threshed בַּחֲרֻצ֥וֹת <WH2742> with threshing instruments הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> of iron אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> into the house חֲזָאֵ֑ל <WH2371> of Hazael וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> which shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> the palaces בֶּן־ הֲדָֽד׃ <WH1130> of Benhadad

וְשָֽׁבַרְתִּי֙ <WH7665> I will break בְּרִ֣יחַ <WH1280> also the bar דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> and cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> the inhabitant מִבִּקְעַת־ <WH1237> from the plain אָ֔וֶן <WH206> of Aven וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <WH8551> and him that holdeth שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> the sceptre מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house עֶ֑דֶן <WH5730> delicate וְגָל֧וּ <WH1540> shall go into captivity עַם־ <WH5971> and the people אֲרָ֛ם <WH758> of Syria קִ֖ירָה <WH7024> unto Kir אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions עַזָּ֔ה <WH5804> of Gaza וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because הַגְלוֹתָ֛ם <WH1540> [the punishment] thereof because they carried away captive גָּל֥וּת <WH1546> captivity שְׁלֵמָ֖ה <WH8003> the whole לְהַסְגִּ֥יר <WH5462> to deliver [them] up לֶאֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> to Edom
וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> on the wall עַזָּ֑ה <WH5804> of Gaza וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> which shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH759> the palaces

וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> And I will cut off יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> the inhabitant מֵֽאַשְׁדּ֔וֹד <WH795> from Ashdod וְתוֹמֵ֥ךְ <WH8551> and him that holdeth שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> the sceptre מֵֽאַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <WH831> from Ashkelon וַהֲשִׁיב֨וֹתִי <WH7725> and I will turn יָדִ֜י <WH3027> mine hand עַל־ <WH5921> upon עֶקְר֗וֹן <WH6138> against Ekron וְאָֽבְדוּ֙ <WH6> shall perish שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> and the remnant פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵי־ <WH6588> transgressions צֹ֔ר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַֽל־ <WH5921> its Because הַסְגִּירָ֞ם <WH5462> [the punishment] thereof because they delivered up גָּל֤וּת <WH1546> captivity שְׁלֵמָה֙ <WH8003> the whole לֶאֱד֔וֹם <WH123> to Edom וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and did not זָכְר֖וּ <WH2142> and remembered בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant אַחִֽים׃ <WH251> not the brotherly
וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּח֣וֹמַת <WH2346> on the wall צֹ֑ר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> which shall devour אַרְמְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH759> the palaces פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions אֱד֔וֹם <WH123> of Edom וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because רָדְפ֨וֹ <WH7291> [the punishment] thereof because he did pursue בַחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> with the sword אָחִיו֙ <WH251> his brother וְשִׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> and did cast off רַחֲמָ֔יו <WH7356> all pity וַיִּטְרֹ֤ף <WH2963> did tear לָעַד֙ <WH5703> perpetually אַפּ֔וֹ <WH639> and his anger וְעֶבְרָת֖וֹ <WH5678> his wrath שְׁמָ֥רָה <WH8104> and he kept נֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> for ever
וְשִׁלַּ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> But I will send אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּתֵימָ֑ן <WH8487> upon Teman וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> which shall devour אַרְמְנ֥וֹת <WH759> the palaces בָּצְרָֽה׃ <WH1224> of Bozrah פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> its Because שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> For three פִּשְׁעֵ֣י <WH6588> transgressions בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וְעַל־ <WH5921> its Because אַרְבָּעָ֖ה <WH702> and for four לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲשִׁיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7725> I will not turn away עַל־ <WH5921> its Because בִּקְעָם֙ <WH1234> [the punishment] thereof because they have ripped up הָר֣וֹת <WH2030> the women with child הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <WH1568> of Gilead לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> order הַרְחִ֥יב <WH7337> that they might enlarge אֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> their border

וְהִצַּ֤תִּי <WH3341> But I will kindle אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> a fire בְּחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> in the wall רַבָּ֔ה <WH7237> of Rabbah וְאָכְלָ֖ה <WH398> and it shall devour אַרְמְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH759> the palaces בִּתְרוּעָה֙ <WH8643> thereof with shouting בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> of battle בְּסַ֖עַר <WH5591> with a tempest בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day סוּפָֽה׃ <WH5492> of the whirlwind

וְהָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> shall go מַלְכָּ֖ם <WH4428> And their king בַּגּוֹלָ֑ה <WH1473> into captivity ה֧וּא <WH1931> He וְשָׂרָ֛יו <WH8269> he and his princes יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> together אָמַ֥ר <WH559> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ
